External Work

NYT Open -- How the New York Times Games Data Team Revamped Its Reporting


Huge amounts of data from Wordle and Connections changed the way our team approached data infrastructure and design. See how we accomplished that.

Data Science for Social Good Final Report -- I-405 Express Toll Lanes Usage, Benefits, and Equity


Using data on each trip taken on the I-405 express toll lanes during operational hours; demographic data on census block groups; and lane speed, volume, and travel time data, we studied how the express toll lanes are used, the benefits they provide to the region, and how these benefits are distributed among different groups of noncommercial users.
